title: IView.LinkParentConfiguration
description: Gets or sets whether to link a projected or auxiliary view with the parent configuration.
returns: True to link a projected or auxiliary view with the parent configuration, false to not
remarks:
After setting this property, call
IModelDoc2::EditRebuild3
.
